trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_SEQ_00<tab>Br'uk Evu has an urgent job for a courageous soul.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_SEQ_01<tab>Br'uk Evu eagerly greets you, expressing that he has a job perfectly suited to your talents. He asks you to take a seat at a nearby table so he can fill you in on the details.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_SEQ_02<tab>The jovial bar owner relates to you the story of a group calling themselves the Passage of the Unbound, who gathered at his establishment and were overheard plotting to steal sacred treasures from across Tural and bring them to Eorzea and beyond, where they would be used to stir unrest. Although the group seemed rather eccentric─and otherwise incompetent─it was not long until representatives from various communities visited Xbalyav Ty'e claiming to be subjects of their misdeeds, and it is these people whom Br'uk Evu wishes you to help. Rral Majun stands by to apprise you of their respective circumstances.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_SEQ_03<tab>Rral Majun is overjoyed that you are willing to assist, but before she can begin her explanation, your conversation is interrupted by one Raholl Ja. The wizened warrior is equally thrilled to learn a helping hand has come at last, and takes it upon himself to tell you about the capabilities of each treasure and what skills might be required to retrieve it. You discover the Mamool Ja himself is in search of a brave soul, and having heard each person's account─directly or indirectly─you contemplate where your abilities might be best used.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_TODO_00<tab>Take a seat at the indicated table.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Rral Majun.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I was wondering when you'd be along! Not a moment too soon, either─I've got an urgent job that needs doing, and there's no one else I'd entrust with it.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_002<tab>Of course, you'll be wanting to know the details. It's a long story, so why don't you grab a seat over there. I'll join you shortly.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_005<tab>I have a few things to finish up here before I join you. Make yourself comfortable, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─it's going to be quite the yarn.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_100<tab>Now that we're all settled, allow me to introduce myself properly. I'm Br'uk Evu, proprietor of Xbalyav Ty'e.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_101<tab>As you know, my establishment is open to anyone. People hailing from across Tural─and sometimes further─come here to whet their appetite and slake their thirst.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_102<tab>Given how we turn no one away, it's inevitable that a few bad apples might mix into my motley patrons, and therein lies the rub. A particularly rotten bunch was here not long ago...
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_103<tab>...Sitting just over there, in fact, and having a conversation most foul.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_105<tab>(-???-)I thank you all for coming here, so far from your respective homes.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_106<tab>(-Elegantly Dressed Woman-)As this is the first time we have all gathered in one place, perhaps formal introductions are in order.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_107<tab>(-Elegantly Dressed Woman-)I am─
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_000_108<tab>Welcome, welcome! What'll you be having?
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_109<tab>(-Elegantly Dressed Woman-)Ahem. Could we have a moment, please?
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_100_109<tab>(-Elegantly Dressed Woman-)We are in the middle of something very important.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_110<tab>(-Elegantly Dressed Woman-)Now then, where was I?

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_111<tab>Oh, yes. I am Apyaahi. If you are sitting here now, it is because I have personally invited you to the Passage of the Unbound─my secretive, villainous order with ambitions to sow discord throughout the world.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_LEOPHYNE_000_112<tab>(-Arrogant Woman-)Hmph. Villains do not often call themselves such.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_LEOPHYNE_000_113<tab>(-Arrogant Woman-)Nor do secret orders have their meetings in places where all eyes can see.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_114<tab>What do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> know! Your snide remarks only ruin my carefully constructed atmosphere. If I had time to think of a suitable slogan, you would understand that words are everything!

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_115<tab>But I digress. I invited you all here for one reason: to throw the world into a mire of chaos, and then watch its nations crumble. What else would we call ourselves if not “villainous”?
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_CHALTEAUFITE_000_116<tab>(-Haughty Man-)My only interest is to punish all who've dared to mock and belittle me. So long as I can achieve that, you can call me whatever you like!
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_CHALTEAUFITE_000_117<tab>(-Haughty Man-)The rich, the powerful, the mighty─all shall be crushed under the weight of my ire!
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_SAMIDARE_000_118<tab>(-Taciturn Man-)...A grand design for a group of six. Even if we managed to muster others to our side, there's a limit to what we can accomplish.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_119<tab>I regret to say you are right. At present we are bound and powerless. That is why, in order to raise our fists against our oppressors, we must find the strength to shatter our shackles.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_120<tab>And in so doing we shall become unbound. Like the birds soaring up above, we shall take flight and spread our wicked wings, staining the azure skies black!
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_121<tab>...Ah, but sometimes skies become treacherous with clouds, and even birds must rest.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_VIRAZAHN_000_122<tab>(-Snobbish Man-)You speak of finding strength. Is that why we are here? To look for it?
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_VIRAZAHN_000_123<tab>(-Snobbish Man-)If so, then I pledge my aid! With newfound might at my beck and call, I shall win adoration known only by a hero!

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_124<tab>Your eagerness is heartening─and you are correct. The tools to make our goal a reality lay in Tural. Across this continent can be found certain artifacts which possess untold power.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_ELLERETE_000_125<tab>(-Mirthful Woman-)Did you say “artifacts”? Ohoho, I sense an adventurous hunt for instruments of devious devilry ahead!
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_ELLERETE_000_126<tab>(-Mirthful Woman-)Hehehe, my imagination is overflowing with images of the new forms my trickery might take! I daresay the world is not ready...

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_127<tab>Yes, well, to get to the heart of the matter─the objects are held by the disparate tribes which make their homes in the Tural continent, where they have been passed down through generations as sacred treasures.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_100_127<tab>Whatever stories these people have attached to their so-called “treasures” matters not. Each contain the essence of fearsome beasts called tural vidraal, and with them in our possession, none shall be able to stand against us.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_110_127<tab>We shall take the objects for ourselves, bring them across the sea, and use them to undermine nations far and wide. The means by which you each choose to do so, I leave in your hands. I only ask that you do not disappoint.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_000_128<tab>I take it there are no questions.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_APYAAHI_100_128<tab>Then let the Passage of the Unbound open unto the world! We begin at once!
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_000_129<tab>They didn't order a single thing...
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_130<tab>That's the long and short of it. What do you think?
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_A1_000_001<tab>They might lack discretion, but they seem formidable nonetheless.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_A1_000_002<tab>They left without ordering anything? Villainous, indeed...

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_131<tab>It's right there in their name. They're unbound by manners and respect, and won't be welcome back here any time soon. You, on the other hand, can stay as long as you like.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_132<tab>Of course, we had a duty to report what we heard to the Landsguard. We did, but it didn't make a damn difference, because soon we learned those unwelcome guests had teeth.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_133<tab>Not long ago, one individual from a remote tribe came here seeking help recovering a stolen relic. Then another came with the same story. Then another, and another, and so on.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_134<tab>By the time we realized the Passage of the Unbound was a real threat, they had one and all made their way across the sea with their ill-gotten gains.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_100_134<tab>Each tribe has sent one of their own to recover what was lost, but being in strange lands, they're at a disadvantage. That's why I've been looking for someone who knows every corner of Eorzea and beyond.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_135<tab>Now, I know you've business in Tural or else you wouldn't be here in the first place. But if you could take the time to hear Rral Majun out, you'd be doing a service to many who could really use a helping hand.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_BRUKEVU_000_140<tab>Rral Majun and I have been searching for someone who can help these poor souls. If you're willing to be that someone, go on and speak with her.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_000_201<tab>Greetings! Allow me to thank you personally for lending your assistance in this matter. We've been quite desperate for someone suitable.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_202<tab>Greetings, Rral Majun. At the risk of becoming a daily nuisance, I must ask─have there been any developments you might share?

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_000_203<tab>A nuisance? Why, perish the thought! You've come just in time, in fact─none other but the vaunted <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has agreed to aid to the search.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_204<tab>Finally, a fortunate turn! So long as our sacred treasures are in wicked hands, our homes shall know no peace.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_205<tab>To say nothing of the danger they pose to other nations. If these thieves really do intend to stir up chaos across the seas, then you had better depart on the next ship!
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_206<tab>But before you do, it might be proper to introduce you to those who have come to Tuliyollal in search of aid.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_207<tab>Loazenikwe there comes from a village far to the north. A single warrior cannot hope to withstand the power of her tribe's relic, so she requires a stout protector─someone that can be leaned upon when times are darkest.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_208<tab>The heirloom that Nyipine must recover afflicts terrible maladies upon its victims. He seeks someone who commands great healing magicks to counteract this effect.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_209<tab>The search for Shashepya's tribal treasure has been entrusted to a peerless hunter. She requires someone to act as a frontline fighter who can distract her target while her bow takes deadly aim.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_210<tab>And lastly, there is Tsuuhe, who knows little about her people's ancient artifact aside that it must not fall into the wrong hands. She seeks a mage of great power, but anything beyond that lies shrouded in mystery...
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_100_210<tab>Aren't you forgetting someone, Raholl Ja? Your crisis is just as pressing, even if you won't say so yourself.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_110_210<tab>Raholl Ja hails from further south than even Mamook, and has traveled many days and nights in search of someone who can strike down their prey from afar. It's the only way to escape the effect of his village's treasure. Did I get that right?
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_211<tab>Indeed, indeed. I do get so forgetful in my old age. Thank you, Rral Majun.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RAHOLLJA_000_212<tab>Five tribes, five stolen treasures. All are waiting for the aid of a brave soul─hopefully that can be <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_000_213<tab>Of course, I'll share all that I know on the matter─you only need ask.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_RRALMAJUN_000_214<tab>And know that I will not hold it against you should you choose to assist only those for whom your talents are best suited. So long as you do what you can, the people of Tural, and maybe even further, will be in your debt.

TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_SYSTEM_000_215<tab>You have gained access to the role quests for Dawntrail! A separate quest line and story is now available for tank, melee DPS, physical ranged DPS, magical ranged DPS, and healer roles.
TEXT_KINGBA001_04817_SYSTEM_000_216<tab>Speak with the people of Tural gathered in Xbalyav Ty'e and assist them with recovering their stolen treasures!
